description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=2/3. Shooting game with an artillery barrage. Modern people came to be able to use necromancy by the power of OOPARTS "Lewjmele" that ancient civilization invented. However, evils that conspire to dominate the world begin to abuse the power as it happened in remote ages, which involves destiny of three nations and three heroes.
